towns.town: wäräda Ganta Afäšum, ṭabiya ˁAddi Qänäy, qušät Məˀəsar Gwəḥila

txfndates.txfndate: Post-Aksumite potsherds (dating between 700/800 and 1200/1300 A.D.), remains of early medieval structures have been recorded at the site.

founders.founder: According to local tradition, the church was founded by Noy (?). The name of the area, ˁAddi Qänäy is said to have been derived from "Noy" (ˁAddi däqqi Noy).

conditions.condition: Gätär. Burial places are located under the overhanging rock, along the river ˀAngar. The old deserted church rock-churcn stands behind the recently built one. Two ruined structures standing closer to the entrance into the gorge are said to be churches of "ˀabba Yoḥanni" and "ˀabba Aboli" (?). Tabots (4): Michael, ˀAbrəha and ˀAṣbəḥa (reportedly the tabot of the old church), Mary, Twenty-Four Heavenly Priests.

descriptions.description: 19 Mss. photographed: MGM-001 “Miracles of Jesus”; MGM-002 “Homily of st. Michael; Miracles of St. Michal”; MGM-003 “Collection of Homilies”; MGM-004 “Pauline Epistles; Acts of the Apostles; Catholic Epistles; Apocalipse of John”; MGM-005 “Synaxarion (The first half of the years)”; MGM-006 “Miracles of Mary”; MGM-007 “Vita of the Apostles”; MGM-008 “Miracles of Jesus ”; MGM-009 “Synaxarion (The second half of the year)”; MGM-010 “Praise of Mary; Collection; Images of the Praise; A Part of Dǝggwa”; MGM-011 “Prayer of Incense; Missal”; MGM-012 “Vita of Libanos Miracles of Libanos”; MGM-013 “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus; Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”; MGM-014 “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus; Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”; MGM-015 “The Book of the Baptismal Rite”; MGM-016 “Vita of ˀArägawi”; MGM-017 “The Book of the Funeral Rite”; MGM-leaves 1 (18) Fragments of different manuscripts; MGM-leaves 2 (19) Fragments of different manuscripts.

furthers.further: L.SERNICOLA,"New archaeological evidence in the area of ʻAddigrat (Eastern Tǝgray)", Rassegna di studi etiopici 4 (nova seria) 2012, pp.61-68.
